name: Super Awesome Commando
description:
Put this M.V.P. together in roughly 18 hours after the game I wanted to make ended up being a bit too ambitious for the time and my level of skill. There is quite a bit of content that I had to put on the back burner for even this game but I plan to flesh it out more as I really enjoyed the project.

WASD - move keys

E - pick up weapon

Q - swap weapon

R - reload weapon

Any and all constructive feedback is greatly appreciated.
